oai_dc:dc.dc:title: L-2 SERRE DUALITY ON DOMAINS IN COMPLEX MANIFOLDS AND APPLICATIONS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: CHAKRABARTI, D
SHAW, MC
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Serre duality
Cauchy-Riemann equation
EXISTENCE THEOREMS
LIPSCHITZ-DOMAINS
BOUNDARIES
REGULARITY
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An L-2 version of the Serre duality on domains in complex manifolds involving duality of Hilbert space realizations of the (partial derivative) over bar -operator is established. This duality is used to study the solution of the (partial derivative) over bar -equation with prescribed support. Applications are given to (partial derivative) over bar -closed extension of forms, as well as to Bochner-Hartogs type extension of CR functions.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: TRANSACTIONS OF THE AMERICAN MATHEMATICAL SOCIETY, 364(7)3529-3554
